title: Christine McGuinness puts on a VERY leggy display in thigh-skimming leather minidress
text:
The results of a gruelling gym regime were on full display as Christine McGuinness stepped out in Alderley Edge on Thursday.

The Real Housewives of Cheshire star caught the eye in a thigh-skimming black leather skirt and matching boots while venturing out in the leafy rural town.

With her toned legs on full display, Christine, 31, inevitably commanded attention while greeting onlookers with a warm smile.

Looking good: The results of a gruelling gym regime were on full display as Christine McGuinness stepped out in Alderley Edge on Thursday

The blonde added to her look with a fitted red top, while a distinctive tasseled handbag proved to be her only notable accessory.

Keeping her eyes shielded behind a pair of sunglasses, Christine looked chic while venturing out for a spot of shopping close to her Cheshire home.

The wife of Paddy McGuiness appeared to be making the most of some time away from her three children with the Take Me Out host.

Hard to miss: The Real Housewives of Cheshire star caught the eye in a thigh-skimming black leather skirt and matching boots while venturing out in the leafy rural town

Upbeat: With her toned legs on full display, Christine, 31, inevitably commanded attention while greeting onlookers

Don't mind me: But Christine caught the eye while reaching into her car on Thursday

Christine was stepping out after revealing that Paddy has lost his wedding ring for the second time.

The mother-of-three took to Instagram on Monday to post a loved-up selfie with her spouse and told fans that he'd lost the ring during a family getaway two months ago and is yet to replace it.

But Christine insisted that she's already forgiven Paddy, 46, for misplacing it, as she joked that he's wearing a T-shirt with her bikini-clad body.

Where's it gone? Christine recently revealed that husband Paddy has lost his wedding ring for the second time

Hilarious: Christine admitted that he misplaced the ring during a family holiday two months ago and is yet to replace it

In the post, Christine noted Paddy's hilarious blunder, and insisted that she's not too upset with the loss as he already has the ring tattooed on his finger.

The selfie showed Paddy - who she married in 2011 - wearing the T-shirt emblazoned with a bikini sketch that was the spitting image of his stunning wife.

She wrote: 'My wonderful husband @mcguinness.paddy lost his wedding ring.. again.. on our family holiday about 2 months ago!. He still hasn’t replaced it but today he is forgiven because he’s wearing a T shirt with my picture on!'
description: The results of a gruelling gym regime were on full display as Christine stepped out in Alderley Edge on Thursday.
